data.title: Manhattan Associates' Warehouse Management And RFID Solutions Selected By ManTech International Corporation
data.meta_description:
Manhattan Associates®, Inc., the
global leader in providing supply chain execution and optimization
solutions, will deploy its Warehouse Management...
data.text:
Manhattan Associates®, Inc. (Nasdaq: MANH), the global leader in providing supply chain execution and optimization solutions, will deploy its Warehouse Management and EPC Manager solutions at ManTech Security Technologies Corporation, a division of ManTech International Corporation. ManTech is a leading provider of information technology services and integrated security and risk management solutions for mission-critical national security programs for the intelligence community and the Departments of Defense, State, Homeland Security and other U.S. government customers. It is expected that Manhattan Associates' solutions will provide inventory tracking, visibility and reporting and RFID capabilities that will enhance the value-added solutions that ManTech provides its customers.

In 2004, ManTech was selected by Business Week magazine as one of the Top 100 Hot Growth Companies and as one of the Top 50 Fastest-Growing Solution Providers by VARBusiness magazine. ManTech will use Manhattan Associates' solutions to help deploy its secure network solutions to more than 260 locations in nearly every country in the world.

"The customers we support operate in a demanding environment with the unique challenges presented by secure global logistics," said Rick Simis, vice president, ManTech Security Technologies Corporation. "We anticipate that Manhattan Associates' Warehouse Management and EPC Manager solutions will play a key role in taking our organizational capabilities to the next level."

Manhattan Associates' Warehouse Management and EPC Manager solutions will allow ManTech to gain increased visibility into orders, shipments and inventory and will ensure compliance with customers that require RFID tagging. The solutions manage distribution center inventory from receiving through shipping, interface to RFID-enabled devices, encode outbound cartons and generate and track EPC status. EPC functionality can be used to generate the data to encode RFID tags and/or create RFID-enabled labels.

Jeff Mitchell, Manhattan Associates' executive vice president, Americas, commented: "ManTech has more than 36 years of experience providing innovative information technology and technical services solutions to the federal government. It is rapidly becoming recognized as a leading provider of high-end solutions to the intelligence community. It understands that its unique role in supporting national security means that it must be sure that best practices are established in its operations to ensure optimal efficiency and performance."

About ManTech International Corporation

Headquartered in Fairfax, Virginia, ManTech International Corporation is a leading provider of innovative technologies and solutions for mission-critical national security programs for the Intelligence Community and the Departments of Defense, State, Homeland Security, Justice and other U.S. federal government customers. The company's expertise includes systems engineering, systems integration, software development, enterprise security architecture, information assurance, intelligence operations support, network and critical infrastructure protection, information technology, communications integration and engineering support. The company supports the advanced telecommunications systems that are used in Operation Iraqi Freedom and in other parts of the world; provides the physical and cyber security to protect U.S. embassies all over the world and has developed a secure, collaborative communications system for the U.S. Department of Homeland Security. With 2004 revenues of $842 million and more than 5,500 highly qualified employees, the company operates in the United States and 40 countries worldwide.
